TopicTitle: Icons on attitude ball, what are they?

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I'm really new to KSP, and have been wondering for a couple days what the pink/purple icons on the attitude ball are? I know the pro and retrograde icons, but these two are pissing me off bigtime xD I've been looking around on the forums and wiki as well without any luck.

Any and all clarification would be awesome,

All the best,

As fas as I am aware:

The purple one without a cross through the centre always points towards the 2nd KSC on Kerbin: (would that make it a pro-centre marker?)

The purple one with cross/dot through the centre always points away from the 2nd Kerbin KSC

feel free to correct, but as far as I am aware these are what the markers do!

Joe
Exactly so. It is supposed to point to the true KSC, but there is a bug.
